data.text: Vigabitile gano, Yesu kachola mwiisi ya Galilaya, halondile kuchola isi ya Yudea kwavija wakulu wa Wayahudi wakala olonda kumkoma.
Siku ya nyimwilinyimwili ya Wayahudi ya viheha ikala behi,
avo ndugu zake Yesu wamulongela, “Segela hanhu hano uchole isi ya Yudea, ili wanhu zako okukweleleza wazone mbuli ziutenda.
Kuduhu munhu yofisa kija kiyotenda kamba yahalonda wanhu wamjuwe goya. Kwavija gweye kotenda mbuli zino, leka wanhu wose wa mwiisi wakujuwe.”
Yesu hatogoligwe hata na ndugu zake.
Yesu kawalongela, “Kipindi changu niye hakinavika. Lakini kipindi chochose kinoga kumwenu.
Wanhu wa mwiisi hawawehila mweye, lakini onihila niye, kwavija siku zose nowalongela gaja goyotenda ganyolodoka.
Mweye choleni kuna inyimwilinyimwili. Niye sichola bule, kwavija kipindi changu hakinavika.”
Yesu kalonga vino, abaho kagendelela kukala mwiisi ya Galilaya.
Ndugu zake Yesu viwacholile kuna inyimwilinyimwili, Yesu nayo kachola. Hacholile kunze kunze lakini kachola kinyelegezi.
Wakulu wa Wayahudi wakala omzahila Yesu hana inyimwilinyimwili. Walonga, “Munhu ija kakwahi?”
Hakala na minong'ono hana ulunhu mbuli ya Yesu. Wanhu wayagwe walonga, “Kanoga,” lakini wayagwe walonga, “Bule, kokwagiza wanhu.”
Lakini kuduhu munhu yokala yolonga mbuli ya Yesu chaka chaka, kwavija wakala owadumba wakulu wa Wayahudi.
Nyimwilinyimwili viikalile hagatigati, Yesu kengila Mng'anda ya Imulungu kasonga kufundiza.
Wakulu wa Wayahudi wakanganya ng'hani na kulonga, “Yokuwaze munhu ino kojuwa vinhu vingi na kuno haifunzile kokose?”
Yesu kawedika, “Mafundizo gano gonifundiza siyo gangu, lakini golawa kwa Imulungu yanhumile.
Munhu yoyose yolonda kutenda goyolonda Imulungu kojuwa gano gonifundiza golawa kwa Imulungu hebu nolonga gaja gonilonda.
Munhu ija yolonga mbuli zake kozahila nhogolwa yake mwenyego. Lakini heyo yozahila nhogolwa kumwake ija yamtumile munhu ayo mkweli, mduhu uvizi mmulomo mmwake.
Vino Musa hawagwelele Malagizo? Lakini kuduhu hata munhu imoja yogagoga. Vino habali molonda kung'homa?”
Lunhu lwa wanhu lumwidika, “Gweye kuna kinyamkela. Nani yolonda kukukoma?”
Yesu kawedika, “Nhenda unzonza umoja, mweye mose mukanganya.
Musa kawalagiza muwengize kumbi wanenu hamoja siyo Musa lakini wahenga zenu awo wasongile, na mweye momwingiza kumbi mwana mna isiku ya Kubwihila.
Kamba mwana kokwingizigwa kumbi mna isiku ya Kubwihila ili sikumubene Malagizo ga Musa, habali monigevuzikila kwavija nimuhonya munhu mna isiku ya Kubwihila?
Lekeni kutagusa kwa meso, lakini mutaguse kwa ukweli.”
Wanhu wayagwe wa Yelusalemu walonga, “Vino ino siyo munhu ija iwakulu olonda kumkoma?
Loleni! Kolonga kunze kunze na hawamulongela mbuli yoyose! Vino iwakulu wamjuwa ayo Kilisito Mkombola?
Lakini Kilisito Mkombola yaheza, kuduhu munhu yonda yajuwe kolawa kwahi, lakini siye tukujuwa koolawa munhu ino.”

Yesu viyakalile kofundiza Mng'anda ya Imulungu, kalonga kwa sauti ng'hulu, “Vino mweye munjuwa goya niye na mukujuwa kuja kundawa? Sizile kwa udahi wangu mwenyego, heyo yanhumile, ni mkweli. Mweye hamumjuwile,
lakini niye nimjuwa, kwavija nolawa kumwake, nayo kanhuma.”
Abaho walonda kumgoga, lakini kuduhu hata munhu imoja yamgolosele mkono, kwavija saa yake ikala hainavika.
Lakini wanhu wengi hana ulunhu wamtogola na kulonga, “Vino Kilisito Mkombola yaheza, kotenda unzonza mkulu kubanza yautendile munhu ino?”
Mafalisayo waluhulika lunhu lonyong'onya mbuli ya Yesu, avo wao na iwakulu wa walava nhosa wawatuma wakalizi wamgoge.
Yesu kalonga, “Nokala na mweye kipindi kidodo, na abaho nochola kumwake ija yanhumile.
Monizahila, lakini honda munyone, kwavija hamudaha kwiza hanhu hanili.”
Wakulu wa Wayahudi wailongela, “Vino munhu ino kochola kwahi mbaka sikutumone? Vino kochola kuna gamabuga ga Wagiliki kuko kookala wanhu zetu na kuwafundiza Wagiliki?
Vino kofambula choni viyolonga, tomzahila lakini honda tumone, na hatudaha kuchola kuko konda yawe?”
Mna isiku ya uhelelo na siku ng'hulu ya inyimwilinyimwili, Yesu kema kakemelela, “Munhu yoyose yokona ng'hilu yeze kumwangu yang'we.
Kamba Maandiko Gang'alile vigalonga, ‘Munhu yonhogola niye, vizanda va mazi gogala ugima vokilima muumoyo wake.’ ”
Yesu kalonga vino mbuli ya Loho Yang'alile, ija wanhu wose omtogola ombokela. Kipindi acho Loho Yang'alile kakala yang'hali hanakwiza, kwavija Yesu kakala hanakwinuligwa muukulu.
Wanhu wayagwe mna ulunhu wamuhulika viyalongile avo na walonga, “Kweli munhu ino mtula ndagu wa Imulungu!”
Wanhu wayagwe walonga, “Heyo ayo Kilisito Mkombola!”
Maandiko Gang'alile golonga kamba Kilisito Mkombola kolawa mulukolo lwa Daudi na kovumbukila Beselehemu kudibuga diyakalile Daudi.”
Avo lunhu luigola mbuli ya Yesu.
Wanhu wayagwe walonda kumgoga Yesu, lakini kuduhu hata munhu imoja yamgolosele mkono.
Wakalizi viwabwelile, wakulu wa walava nhosa na Mafalisayo wawauza, “Habali hamumgalile?”
Wakalizi wawedika, “Kuduhu munhu yolonga kamba munhu ayo!”
Mafalisayo wawauza, “Vino na mweye vivija muviziligwa?”
“Mumjuwa mkulu yoyose hebu Mfalisayo yomtogola?
Lunhu luno halugajuwile Malagizo ga Musa, avo waduwiligwa na Imulungu!”
Nikodemo kakala imoja wa Mafalisayo wakalile aho, ayo yacholile kumulola Yesu ichanduso. Kawalongela wayage,
“Vino Malagizo getu godaha kumtagusa munhu yoyose bila tanhu kumuhulika na kukijuwa kija kiyatendile?”
Wamwidika, “Vino na gweye vivija kolawa mwiisi ya Galilaya? Gasome Maandiko Gang'alile na koifunza, kuduhu mtula ndagu wa Imulungu yalawile mwiisi ya Galilaya.”
Abaho kila munhu kachola ukae kumwake.
